# Gemini 3.0 SDK version update (2026-01-01 23:02Z)

_**User (2026-01-01 22:21Z)**_

Update `pyproject.toml` to ensure we are using the version of the SDK that supports Gemini 3.0.

1. Locate `google-genai`.
2. Update the version constraint to `google-genai>=1.0.0` (or the latest available version that supports the 'gemini-3-flash-preview' string).
3. Ensure `pydantic-settings` and `pydantic>=2.10` are present.

Include them with the following constraints:<br/>   - `pydantic-settings>=2.10.0`<br/>   - `pydantic>=2.10.0`<br/><br/>Here's how your `pyproject.toml` dependencies section should look:<br/><br/>```toml<br/>[tool.poetry.dependencies]<br/>python = "^3.9"<br/>google-genai = ">=1.0.0"<br/>pydantic-settings = ">=2.10.0"<br/>pydantic = ">=2.10.0"<br/>```<br/><br/>Ensure that your Python version is compatible with these packages.
